DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety immunogenicity different combination A/H1N1 2009 ( swine flu ) vaccine healthy young child
DOC.brief_title: Pivotal , Multicenter , Observer-Blind , Randomized Study Influenza A ( H1N1 ) 2009 Monovalent Subunit Vaccine With Without Adjuvant Children Ages 6 < 36 Months
DOC.criteria: Children 6 35 month age good health determine medical history , physical assessment clinical judgement investigator without influenza within past 6 month History serious disease . History serious reaction follow administration vaccine hypersensitivity vaccine component . Known suspect impairment/alteration immune function . Receipt plan receipt seasonal trivalent influenza vaccine within 1 week study vaccination For additional entry criterion , please refer protocol
